refnamediv.refpurpose: Perform one step of the Durbin-Levinson algorithm..

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence

listitem.para: The vector C specifies the autocovariances '[gamma_0, ..., gamma_t]' from lag 0 to T.
It specifies the coefficients based on C(T-1).

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This is an Octave function. Perform one step of the Durbin-Levinson. If OLDPHI and OLDV are omitted, all steps from 1 to T of the algorithm are performed.
